roundDescription: (8 points) Yes, it's a whole round on tanks.

questions.questionText: To get in good with the Duke of Milan, what backwards-writing genius drew up designs for a turtle-shaped, tank-like fighting vehicle in 1487?
Battling Nazis on the Eastern Front in a tank she paid for herself, Mariya Oktyabrskaya was justifiably named a "Hero of" what super-state?
During one episode of "Jay Leno's Garage," what actor-turned-politician crushed a limo with a tank he once drove in the Austrian army?
The boxy Scorpion is the go-to battle tank for the United Nations Space Command and their Spartans, as depicted in what flagship Xbox franchise?
The world's only operational Tiger tank was rolled out for an impressive cameo in what 2014 film where it almost sent Brad Pitt to a fiery grave?
When a military magazine told an A.I. to reimagine famous paintings with tanks, what artwork got turned into this... thing?
Named for General Creighton Something, America's main battle tanks since the '80s have all been variations on the M1 WHAT?
Last year a teenager kept it weird by renting a tank and the services of a unicycling bagpiper dressed as Darth Vader, for his prom in what West Coast city?
Bonus: In a memorable scene from "The Interview," fake Kim Jong Un blew stuff up in a tank, while cranking what Katy Perry tune about happier explosions?
